project_objectives: The objective of this research is to determine if stream and riparian habitats are more effective at serving as movement corridors than their surrounding terrestrial habitats.
data_citation: Andy, K., Little, C.. 2022. Last updated September 2023. Riparian Corridors for Wildlife Movement. http://n2t.net/ark:/63614/w12004250. Accessed via wildlifeinsights.org on 2023-09-04.
